title: My notes - Quick & Easy Note
description:
My Notes makes it easy to create and organize your notes quickly. Save notes in categories, set reminders, and even add photos to make your notes more memorable. Features include:

- Create quick & easy notes
- Create todo lists.
- Category organization for easy access
- Reminder settings to keep you on track
- Photo integration in notes
- Sharing options to collaborate with others
- Backup support for safe storage.
- OCR functionality to extract text from images using Google Vision API.
